1GARD International Marketing Network Access Program

 

We respect the privacy of our customers.

There is no way to confront information Cardholder have filled in Application with Him (Her) as a Person. There is out of all relations to your Individuality after you have submit your Application to 1GARD Processing Center. It is not identifiable. Info will turned into not personal records by automated process. We use secured data transfer layer. (Secure Socket Layer).

We need the e-mail address to notify you about expiration date and changes of . We secure and keep confidentiality, any information our customers share with us. We do not reveal personal information to any third party. Names & mailing address will be disconnected with the rest of information after the card number will be generated.

All access card transaction analysis of the company-member are given only to this company, not transfered to the third party.

This is the 1GARD 's privacy policy.
